source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_SEQ_00<tab>J'nairoh would like to thank you for your help.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_SEQ_00<tab>アラギリのジャ・ナイロは、改めて冒険者にお礼が言いたいようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the J tribe youngling.
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_TODO_01<tab>Rendezvous with the J tribe youngling and slay any mating kongamato that appear.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_TODO_01<tab>ジャ族の少女と合流して<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2172C01 /var>を討伐

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the J tribe youngling.
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the J tribe youngling.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_TODO_03<tab>アラギリのジャ族の少女と話す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_000<tab>There you are! Everyone's talking about the brave adventurer who fought at the battle of Castellum Velodyna. I had no idea that was you. I can't thank you enough for what you've done for us, and for my sister.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_000聞いたわ、あなたって有名なのね？
ベロジナ大橋の戦いでも活躍したそうね。
妹の件も含めて、ほんとうにありがとう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_001<tab>Speaking of which, she's been looking for you. Probably to thank you again for rescuing her.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_001妹も、あなたの話を聞いて、
改めてお礼が言いたいって言ってたっけ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_002<tab>I think she's over by the north eastern gate if you care to have a look.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_002今は北東の門の近くにいるはずだから、
よかったら、声をかけてあげて。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_003<tab>I'm fairly certain my sister was near the north eastern gate.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_003今は北東の門の近くにいるはずだから、
よかったら、声をかけてあげて。

TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_010あ、冒険者さん！
この前は、本当にありがとう！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_011<tab>My sister was quite upset with me before, and rightfully so. I promised her I won't run off alone and put myself in danger, which is why I need your help.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_011あの後、姉さんには叱られたけど、やっぱり訓練は続けたいんだ。
でも、もうひとりで危険な場所に行ったりはしないよ。
だからさ、手伝ってくれないかな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_012<tab>I mean to slay a group of kongamato nesting nearby, but not merely for training. No, this is for the good of all of Ala Ghiri.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_012あなたは今まで会った誰よりも強いし、有名な冒険者でもある。
それに今回はね、ただ魔物を倒すだけじゃなくて、
みんなの役に立つ仕事だっていったら、興味ある？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_013<tab>They've begun breeding, laying eggs in the watering hole north of here. If they continue, they'll ruin one of the few sources of water we have. Come, we must put an end to them.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_013「」が、北の水場に卵を産みつけたんだ。
このままじゃ、貴重な水源を荒らされちゃう。
だから、一緒に行って、奴らを倒そう！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_030<tab>That's twice now you've saved me. It took everything I had to slay even one.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_030……また、助けられちゃったね。
一匹は倒せたんだけど、思ったより数が多くて……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_031<tab>At least now the watering hole is safe. Let's return to Ala Ghiri.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_031と、とにかく、水源は守れたことだし、
いったんアラギリに戻ろっか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_040<tab>You were amazing back there. It reminded me of all those stories about my aunt.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_040やっぱり、冒険者さんってすごく強いんだね。
モルバ叔母さんも、同じくらい強かったのかなぁ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_041<tab>A shame not all of the J tribe think so highly of her. They say she abandoned her home and the tribe, but I don't believe she would do such a thing. Not if there was another way.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_041ジャ族には、叔母さんのことを悪く言う人もいるんだ。
土地や一族を捨てた、って言ってさ。
でも、それ以外の道があったら、ここに残ってたはず……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_042<tab>I know she would have stayed if there was. She would have fought and protected us all. One day I'll be strong enough to do what she couldn't.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_042強ければ、力があれば……みんなを守りながら、
同時に、故郷を捨てない方法も見つけられたかもしれないんだ。
だから、私は強くなりたい！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_043<tab>My loved ones will never need fear the Garleans, or anyone else ever again.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_043魔物を倒せるとか、槍をうまく使えるとか、
そういうことじゃなくて……。
誰かを、大切な人を守るために、私はこの槍を振るいたい。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_044<tab>My sister can yell at me until she's blue in the face, but I refuse to give up.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_044そのためにも……特訓はやめない。
これからも、みんなに迷惑をかけちゃうかもしれない。
でも、絶対に諦めたくないんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_045<tab>That said, I'm like to stumble a few times along the way. I hope I can look to you again for help if I need it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JASISTER02833_000_045だからさ、冒険者さん。
また、なにかあったら、よろしくね？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_051<tab>So she's involved you in more trouble, has she? Well, I can't get mad at her for protecting the watering hole.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_051ごめんなさい、また迷惑をかけてしまったみたいね。
でも今回は、思いっきり叱った後、少しだけ褒めてあげるわ。
誰かのために槍を振るいたい……その気持ちだけは、否定しない。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_052<tab><sigh> I keep forgetting my little sister isn't quite so little anymore. And it seems a knack for fighting runs in the family.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_052それにしても、まだ子どもだと思ってたのに、
いろいろ考えるようになったのね。
やっぱり、血は争えないってことかしら。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_053<tab>Speaking of which, curiosity got the better of me, and I asked a few of the soldiers if they knew aught of my aunt.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_053そういえば、あなたと話した後、叔母のことが気になって、
解放軍の人たちから話を聞いてみたの。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_054<tab>They say a woman matching her description works closely with a man named Arenvald. I plan to send her a letter, asking her to come bid her sister a final farewell.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_054そしたら彼女によく似た人が、
どこかの部隊を手伝ってるって聞いて、手紙を託してきたわ。
一度、母の墓にお参りに来て欲しいって。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_055<tab>If my sister finds out, she's like to run off in search of her. I hope she doesn't, but I can't stop her from living her own life. Should that day come, I'll just have to...to...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_055妹が、叔母について行ってしまわないか心配だけど……。
あの子の人生は、あの子のもの。
そのときは、笑って送り出してあげないとね。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_056<tab>Ahem. Sorry about that. Don't let me keep you with these sob stories. I'm sure my sister will be fine.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ812_02840_JNAIROH_000_056やだ……これもまだ、気が早い話だったわ。
ありがとう、冒険者さん。
